| --- |

| BM |
| CB |
| DIO |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |

| BM |

The entities "PC", "BM", and "CB" clearly refer to material names in the paragraph. The entity "DIO" does not refer to a material name and has been removed from the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: First , film morphology was Figure 6 shows the PL spectra of the polymers and polymer : PC 70 BM blend films spin - coated from CB solutions or CB solutions containing 3 vol % DIO additives.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PL spectra |
| polymers |
| polymer : PC 70 BM blend films |
| spin - coated |
| CB solutions |
| CB solutions containing 3 vol % DIO additives |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PL spectra |
| polymers |
| polymer : PC 70 BM blend films |
| spin - coated |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties and were removed:

* CB solutions
* CB solutions containing 3 vol % DIO additives

Note that "spin-coated" is a process used to create thin films, and although it is not a material property, it is relevant to the discussion of film morphology and is therefore included in the list.
